title: the rise
author: the rise
created_time: December 01, 2022, 02:41:00 PMLast edit: December 11, 2022, 06:45:30 PM by the rise
content: Campaign introductionBounty Campaign Dates: DEC 01 - DEC 14 lasts for 2 weeks.The distribution of tokens to participants will be arranged by the Script Network teamTokens will be distributed to participants' your wallet addresses (bep 20).Terms And ConditionsParticipants should Join Script Network on social media:- Discord - Telegram - Twitter You receive stakes for completing campaign tasks, after the end of the Testers campaign, stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula:testers tokens = number of your stakes / total number of stakes* allocated total number of tokensTesters related issues and spam messages are forbidden in the project 's official group/pages. Ask boundty related questions in CMBM servicesCheating and using bots are strictly forbidden, cheating participants could be disqualifiedFollow all updates in this thread and Discord: Script Network You may make reports every day! (or at least every 7 days) Do not quote your old report! Format for proof of authentication post: Code:Proof of authentication:- Forum Username:- Wallet address:- Twitter Profile- Discord Username:- Telegram Username:  DURATIONweek 1 : 01/12 - 06/12week 2 : 07/12 - 14/12RULES- All participants must join the official channel.https://discord.gg/GneJbNAbXJ- Follow twitter @akeemojuko & Script Network- You must be active on Discord every day - You should see daily twitter @akeemojuko & Script Network activity and recent post retweets- make sure you joined discord correctlynote "to join discord requires bot verification"- make 2 comments on twitter- do activities every day and avoid spam, if you make a spam message you will be disqualified and will not get rewardsREWARDS$15 in SCPT/WEEKReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Discord username:Twitter link profile :Week 1- link message- linkmessage- link message- link message- link message- link message- link message- link message- link messagemore...twitter - comments link- comments link- retweets link- retweets link- retweets link- retweets link- retweets link- retweets linkmore...noteif you don't invite anyone, you don't have to fill out the weekly reportPlease make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post. FORM JOIN

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: ReservedFree Claim1. Head here and claim an OAThttps://galxe.com/ScriptNetwork/campaign/GC3mnUtJJx2. Follow https://twitter.com/akeemojuko and https://twitter.com/script_network
